thread.title: Traffic rerouted as dump truck strikes bridge in Oromocto
thread.title_full: Traffic rerouted as dump truck strikes bridge in Oromocto

author: cbc
title: Traffic rerouted as dump truck strikes bridge in Oromocto
text:
Motorists travelling between Oromocto and Fredericton through Lincoln will need to take an alternate route as the Lincoln Bridge has been closed to all traffic, RCMP say.
RCMP Cpl. Jayson Hansen said a dump truck struck the bridge at about 12:30 a.m. Sunday.
"The back end struck the top of the bridge, taking the whole bucket or box off the dump truck," he said.
The Lincoln Bridge on Route 102 in Oromocto is closed. Traffic is being rerouted via Nevers Road. (Google Maps)
The road is closed pending an engineering assessment, he said.
Route 102 near the Fredericton airport is shut down and vehicles are being rerouted via Nevers Road.
